comments.author: Dawid Weiss
comments.body: I didn't check but this may be a result of adding those handlers to dump reproduce seed on uncaught? I'll take a look later today.

comments.author: Dawid Weiss
comments.body: Applied to trunk and 3.x, attaching patch for completeness.

description:
an example is the recent fail: https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-3.x/680/

it would be better to not populate -Dtestmethod with anything here...
summary: when tests fail, sometimes the testmethod in 'reproduce with' is null
